node.display_long_description:
Ever wanted to be a cyber ninja? A top-selling VR game and probably the best cyber ninja simulator ever, Sairento VR offers you that opportunity! Perform quadruple jumps, wall runs, power slides, back flips and even get to manipulate time. Empty lead into an enemy before spinning around to sink your blade into another. Kit yourself with katanas, firearms, bows, throwing glaives, shurikens, kunais and more - they are all at your disposal. Keep growing your experience and upgrading your skills. 
 
• Single player mode.
• Co-op mode.
• 10 exciting maps with hordes of enemies to test your ninja skills on.
• A unique locomotion system that allows you to move and fight like a ninja. 
• Fight with more than 20 different types of weapons and develop your own combat style. 
• Keep upgrading your abilities and weapons as you accumulate experience from completing missions.

nodes.title: Sairento VR : Untethered - Quest 2 Updates!
nodes.body_text:
Hey Ninjas, we’ve been receiving a lot of requests for a Quest 2 update and it’s finally ready! We made the following optimization and visual enhancements to Sairento VR: Untethered so Quest 2 owners can take advantage of the device’s stronger processing power:

- Improved fidelity with up to 90fps.
- Increased spawn rate of enemies from 5 to up to 9 for more frenetic encounters.
- Increased duration of how long slayed enemy bodies can remain in the scene for a more immersive experience.
- Added splashed blood decals that affect the environment when enemies are attacked for better visual feedback.

To activate Quest 2 settings, please navigate to Settings > Oculus Quest and select ‘Plus’.

node.reviewDescription:
There are a lot of vr games that have fighting with swords or guns. A lot of games that have teleport or smooth locomotion. A lot of games that are single player only.
This game combines the best of all worlds(and co op) seamlessly while allowing you to do prince of Persia parkour and has a great sense of progression. At first I'm like, "this is just robo recall mixed with ninja legends." But then I realized this game was so much more. There are many different weapons and playstyles. Wanna be a swordsman? There's a loadout you can customize for that. Wanna be Katnis Everdeen? There's a loadout you can customize for that. Wanna be in the matrix, deflect bullets and backflip over enemies and run on walls? Guess what... you can do that with any load out. Customize your gear and armor, and play with your closest friends, or people you don't even know. This is seriously one of my favorite games now. The dlc packages add extra stages and weapons but are not essential to the experience. The dlc packages are also well priced, and I look forward to future updates. The game sets you in a stage and gives you, the cyber ninja, full free choice how to accomplish your goal. Missions don't take too long, and its easy to pick up and play just a round or two, while also having plenty of customisation options. The motions can be a bit disorienting however, and this game should not be your first vr experience because you will likely fall over until your body and eyes are accustomed to virtual reality. I play this game until my headset runs out of batteries, because there are so many great weapon options. Big thumbs up. Not to mention there are plenty of settings to get the feel of handling the controls just right. Much love 💘. 
-PM

developerResponse.body: Thank you so much for your kind words and support! We have moved on to our next game so there will not be anymore content updates to Sairento Untethered. We really hope you can understand. :)

website_page_meta.description: The new untethered version of Sairento VR. Built from the ground up with 10 never seen before locations, existing Sairento fans will be thrilled to know that they can now experience being a cyber ninja without pesky wires. For the uninitiated, this game is your gateway to being the ultimate cyber ninja. Perform multiple jumps, wall runs, power slides and slow time down while slashing or gunning down your enemies. Kit yourself with 20+ weapons and keep upgrading as you play. PURE CYBER NINJA FUN.
website_page_meta.title: Sairento VR : Untethered · Oculus Quest
